channel.title: InfraSketch Blog
channel.description: System design tutorials, architecture patterns, and AI-powered diagram generation tips from InfraSketch

item.title: Machine Learning System Design Patterns: The Complete Guide
item.description: Complete guide to ML system design patterns covering end-to-end pipelines, feature stores, model serving, training infrastructure, and production monitoring. Includes interview prep and real-world examples.

item.title: LLM System Design Architecture: Building Production AI Applications
item.description: How to design production LLM applications including RAG systems, chatbot architectures, agent frameworks with LangGraph, vector databases, and scaling strategies.

item.title: Real-World AI System Architecture: Case Studies from Netflix, Uber, and More
item.description: Deep-dive case studies of AI architectures at Netflix, Uber, Google, Spotify, and more. Learn how top companies design recommendation engines, search ranking, and ML platforms.

item.title: Agentic AI System Architecture: Designing Multi-Agent Systems
item.description: Design patterns for agentic AI systems including single-agent, multi-agent, supervisor, and hierarchical architectures. Covers LangGraph, tool integration, and production deployment.

item.title: ML Model Serving System Design: From Prototype to Production
item.description: Complete guide to ML model serving architecture covering real-time inference, batch prediction, scaling strategies, A/B testing, and latency optimization patterns.

item.title: Vector Database System Design: Architecture for AI Applications
item.description: Architecture guide for vector databases covering embeddings, ANN algorithms, indexing strategies, and integration with RAG systems. Compares Pinecone, Weaviate, Milvus, pgvector, and Qdrant.

item.title: AI Pipeline System Design: Data Ingestion, Training, and Serving
item.description: End-to-end AI pipeline architecture covering data ingestion, feature engineering, model training, validation, deployment, and monitoring with orchestration patterns.

item.title: MLOps System Design: Reference Architecture for 2026
item.description: Reference architecture for MLOps covering CI/CD for ML, experiment tracking, model registry, automated retraining, monitoring, and drift detection at scale.

item.title: Feature Store System Design: Architecture and Patterns
item.description: Design patterns for feature stores covering offline and online serving, feature computation, consistency, and integration with ML training and serving pipelines.

item.title: Streaming ML System Design: Real-Time Machine Learning Architecture
item.description: Architecture patterns for real-time ML systems covering stream processing, online feature computation, low-latency inference, and fraud detection case studies.

item.title: AI System Design for Startups: Practical Architecture Patterns
item.description: Practical AI architecture patterns for startups covering build vs buy decisions, MVP architectures, scaling strategies, cost optimization, and common pitfalls to avoid.

item.title: AI System Design Whitepaper: Comprehensive Reference Architecture
item.description: Comprehensive reference architecture for AI systems covering the full ML lifecycle, infrastructure patterns, governance, and enterprise deployment strategies.

item.title: Awesome Machine Learning System Design: Curated Resource Guide
item.description: Curated collection of the best resources for learning ML system design including papers, courses, books, tools, open-source projects, and interview prep materials.

item.title: AWS Architecture Diagram Generator: Create Cloud Diagrams with AI
item.description: Learn how to create professional AWS architecture diagrams using AI. Compare tools, explore patterns, and generate cloud infrastructure diagrams in seconds.

item.title: System Design Interview Prep: Ultimate Practice Guide for 2026
item.description: Complete system design interview preparation guide with 4-week study plan, top 15 questions, RESHADED framework, and practice strategies using AI tools.

item.title: Data Lake Architecture Diagram: Design Patterns and Best Practices
item.description: Complete guide to data lake architecture with medallion pattern, component diagrams, AWS/Azure implementations, and best practices for 2026.

item.title: The Complete Guide to System Design in 2026
item.description: Master system design from fundamentals to advanced patterns. Learn scalability, caching, databases, and architecture patterns used by top tech companies.

item.title: System Design Interview Cheat Sheet: The Ultimate Guide
item.description: A comprehensive cheat sheet for system design interviews. Includes frameworks, patterns, common questions, and quick references for Google, Meta, Amazon interviews.

item.title: Architecture Diagram Best Practices: A Complete Guide
item.description: Learn how to create effective software architecture diagrams. Covers diagram types, C4 model, best practices, common mistakes, and tools.

item.title: Best AI Diagram Tools Compared: 2026 Guide
item.description: Compare the top AI-powered diagram tools including InfraSketch, Eraser, ChatGPT, Whimsical, and Miro. Find the best tool for your needs.

item.title: Watch: Design System Architecture in 3 Minutes with InfraSketch
item.description: See InfraSketch in action - a quick demo showing how to generate complete system architecture diagrams from natural language.

item.title: How AI Tools Can Accelerate Your Engineering Career
item.description: Learn how leveraging agent-powered development tools like InfraSketch can help you level up as an engineer and advance your career.

item.title: What is System Design? A Complete Beginner's Guide
item.description: Learn the fundamentals of system design, why it matters, and how to approach designing scalable distributed systems.

item.title: Best AI Tools for System Architecture Diagrams in 2025
item.description: Compare the top agent-powered and AI tools for creating system architecture diagrams, including features, pricing, and use cases.

item.title: How to Prepare for System Design Interviews
item.description: A practical guide to acing system design interviews at top tech companies, with tips and common patterns.
